snippet: STRONG--Nancy Ruth, (nee Goldin), mother of Wendy and the late Amy, widow of Robert, partner of Paul Stessel, sister of Joan and Arthur Riegel, Bruce and Shelly Goldin, aunt to many nieces and nephews, grandnieces and grandnephews. Services Monday, 11am at Boulevard Riverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STRONG--Nancy Ruth, (nee Goldin), mother of Wendy and the late Amy, widow of Robert, partner of Paul Stessel, sister of Joan and Arthur Riegel, Bruce and Shelly Goldin, aunt to many nieces and nephews, grandnieces and grandnephews. Services Monday, 11am at Boulevard Riverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STRONG, NANCY RUTH
